attributes.action: Overturn the no-smoking ban & let the people of this country have a vote on it
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe being told that smoking is banned in pubs clubs etc is an infringement of our freedom to chose.Our ancestors fought & gave there lives to give us freedom & freedom of speech.
By being told where you can & cannot smoke is like being back at school & `pushed` around by teaching staff,
Bring back smoking & none smoking rooms in pubs,it worked years ago, or if an establishment allows smoking signs put on outside doors stating this mean you are free to chose whether you enter the place or not!!
I am a non smoker but believe in freedom of choice for everyone not just those in `power`!!
